feed.title: Timothy Blumberg
feed.subtitle: Hello! I'm Timothy Blumberg and I'm glad you are here. This site is useful for me to talk about things I'm interested in as well as let you know how to get in contact with me.

entry.title: My First Blog Post
entry.content:
Hey there. This is essentially a test of the post functionality. I might come back later and add some serious posts.

So far this is it
entry.summary: Hey there. This is essentially a test of the post functionality. I might come back later and add some serious posts.
